overview: In our lives, you have to endure moments when you don’t know how to behave. In a Japanese wedding, everything proceeds as planned, but you can’t do something else even if you are bored, and you can’t look displeased because it is an auspicious occasion. At the end, liberation should be awaiting…
tagline: In our lives, you have to endure moments when you don’t know how to behave.
title: Happo-en
